content: crochet zipper pouch pattern and photo tutorial ***this listing is for a pdf download and printable pattern not the actual item*** these little zip-up bags/pouches were super fun to make and are super handy for storing items included in this file crochet pattern with photos to make these zip up bags as well as instructions with photos of each step on how to crochet around a zipper materials worsted weight yarn you can use any worsted-weight yarn for this project here is what i used for my bags o larger bag red heart soft in minty lilac off white and strawberry red heart soft baby steps o smaller bag caron simply soft yarn in watermelon blue mint and light grape red heart soft baby steps zipper i used a 7-inch-long zipper but you could use any length 3 5mm crochet hook yarn needle optional to make the holes in the zipper fabric i used the fiskars contour rotary cutter with a skip-stitch cutting blade this is a quick and easy way to cut even holes in fabric to crochet around the blade i have cuts holes that are ¼ inch apart as an alternative you can also achieve this by using a ruler and a pen to make marks on the fabric and then use a blade or a needle to poke the holes through for more details see http //www loopsandlovecrochet com/2018/05/21/zipper-pouch **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loopsandlovecrochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own ** thank you and happy crocheting loopsandlovecrochet this pattern and others are available for free on my blog at www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are purchasing an ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
